tagline: Seal is kind of actually cool
rules:
1. Respect eachother
2. No hatespeech
3. Saying Seal is not cool is not very nice
infoBoard: This group is almost only for the sake of making my own spin the wheel board or for me doing tournaments.

categories.x:
